transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir, I am talking from IndiaMART. Please speak. Sir, you were talking to [unintelligible] sir.
Customer: Haan, bilkul boliye.
Executive: Sir, you had a query received. You were telling that you are not getting buyleads of relevant products.
Customer: Haan, calls vagarah nahi aa rahe hain isme. Isme TrustSeal wala package liya hu main, teen mahine ho gaye kuch bhi nahi aaya, business nahi aaya mere paas.
Executive: Okay, okay, main check kar leta hu sir. Haan, nahi aa raha sir aapko ye?
Customer: Ye abhi jo TrustSeal package liya baad mein kabhi bhi ek baar bhi nahi aaya mere paas.
Executive: Okay, main check kar leta hu sir. Sir, abhi aap laptop pe hain ya mobile phone pe hain?
Customer: Mobile phone se hu main toh. Abhi mere paas thoda time nahi hai, aap thoda shaam ko karna baat call karne ke liye, abhi kaam par hu main.
Executive: Oh, hello. Accha abhi aap kaam pe. Sir, main ye keh raha tha, toh abhi main aapko ye sahi kar deta hu. Thik hai, abhi isme kuch detail aapki missing thi isliye nahi aa raha tha, main aapko bata deta hu kya karna hai aapko.
Customer: Abhi aap mobile phone mein login hai na sir abhi aap?
Executive: Login hu lekin aap apne system se sahi kar dijiye aap apne system ke hisab se.
Customer: Haan, main yaha se sahi karunga lekin sir main ye keh raha tha abhi aap mobile phone se baat kar rahe the na, sahi cheezein main aapko bata deta ek baar. Abhi jo buyleads ki aapko dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Toh abhi aap login kar lijiye sir, main aapko bata deta hu sir.
Executive: Aapko jo buyleads nahi aa rahi hai na sir, usi ke regarding main aapko bata deta hu sir. Aapko buyleads aane lagenge.
Customer: Call vagarah nahi aa rahe hain call.
Executive: Toh ek bhi call nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi sir, lekin woh bilkul bilkul farzi call aayi hai, bina kaam ki call apne, kuch kaam ke nahi hai. Seedha out call aayi hai inko. Accha main product ki. Matlab jo jo jo call aati hai aapke paas woh kya bolte hain aise customer kya aapke paas call aati hai?
Executive: Kya bolte hain woh?
Customer: Jaise mere paas mitti ka item hai. Ab toh ek do call aate hain plastic ke bartano ke liye, woh wale aate hain call aate hain mere liye mere paas. Plastic ke botal chahiye, falan plastic ke paani ke botal vagarah iske liye aate hain, mera kaam hi mitti ka.
Executive: Okay, matlab relevant aapko matlab jo calls vagarah aa rahi hai relevant aapko calls nahi aa rahi hai ye kehna chahte hain aap sahi hai. Haan, kaam jo mera kaam se kaam related call nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main verify check kar raha hu jaise abhi main dekh pa raha hu aapke abhi do number add hain 90813. Aapko jo call aa rahi hogi aap dekhiye jo aapka jo number hai aapko jo assign kiya gaya hai 7949341826 isse byer naam se save kar lijiye. Call aapko aayegi toh ye wala number aapka show hoga. Thik hai? 79 wala. Jab aap agar aapko call aap check karna chahe aap isse bhi check kar sakte ho byer detail se byer aapko call karta hoga toh ye call karta hoga 7949341826 wala number se aapko call karta hoga.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Toh aap waha se bhi check kar sakte ho. Abhi jo aapko buyleads ki problem aa rahi hai main woh bhi resolve kar deta hu. Thik hai sir? Aap apne system ke hisab se kar dijiye abhi main kaam karunga nahi.
Executive: Haan, main yaha se sir sahi kar raha hu. Thik hai? Thik hai. Toh abhi aapko dekho abhi jo apna login hai na aapka jo IndiaMART ka app hai usse aap login kar lijiye.
Customer: Awaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan, IndiaMART ka jo app hai sir login kar lijiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Login kar liya aapne?
Customer: Abhi woh kya baat ho rahi hai isliye woh net sahi tarah se nahi chal raha hai abhi baat ho rahi hai is wajah se sim se.
Executive: Accha baat ho rahi hai isliye nahi chal raha hai?
Customer: Network nahi chal raha hai haan. Toh aap ek kaam karo aap shaam ko karna aap call 5:00 baje baad mein.
Executive: Toh sir main aisa karta hu ki abhi jo hai aap bol rahe hain na calls vagarah aa rahi hai ek baar aap try karke dekhiye. Dusre number se try karke dekhiye main aapko number bata deta hu. Aap bataiye mujhe call aa rahi hai ya nahi. Yaha se waise yaha se thik kar diya hai maine. Jo ye wala jo number aap dial karenge jo aapko byer dial karega 7949341826 toh aapko call jo hai yaha se aane lagenge. Thik hai? Ye wala yaha se check kar sakte hain. Thik hai, baki aapko buyleads vagarah yaha se is wajah se dekh liya hai maine yaha se sari cheezein waise ab maine update bhi kar diya hai. Kuch cheezein aapke product vagarah missing hai woh bhi sir main aapka yaha se update kar dunga aur ek baar main aapko 4:00 baje connect bhi kar lunga. Toh aapka sir tension close kar du sir. Sir abhi main 5:00 baje call karna aap.
Customer: 5:00 baje? Haan.
Executive: Haan, 5:00 baje main call kar lunga ek baar. Thik hai. Main sir woh ye keh raha tha abhi jo aapne ek aapne ek ticket raise kiya tha, ticket raise hua tha na sir jaise aapne query dali thi isliye ticket raise hua tha.
Customer: Haan. Toh main aapko tension close kar sakta hu ab?
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai, toh main aapko call karunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Receiving irrelevant calls.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the account and updated details.

- Provided a number to save for identifying buyer calls.

- Will update missing product details.

- Will call back at 5:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant calls, trustseal, product update
